nodes.speaker: narrator
nodes.text: A gingerbread approches you, their face expression looks off. Wonder what is going on.

nodes.speaker: gingerbread
nodes.text: Hhhh..hi, I would like to make a bet.

nodes.speaker: player
nodes.text: You look like you know something lil guy. Care to spill it out?

nodes.speaker: gingerbread
nodes.text: Something big is going to happen at today's match. Better keep your eyes and ears open.

nodes.speaker: narrator
nodes.text: The gingerbread quicken their pace as if they are fleeing from something.
